item.title: Backtick and tilde on an Italian keyboard
item.description: If you’re using an Italian keyboard or any keyboard that does not have built-in keys for backtick ` and tilde ~ characters and you do some kind of programming or simply write your notes in Markdown everyday like me, you’ll know the struggle of hitting the Alt + 126 ASCII keycode for the tilde and Alt + 96 for the backtick. Everything is smooth until you need to write a code block in Markdown that needs 6 (six!
